ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: cant wear armor?
ygData.msgSnippet: What server are you playing on?  If Rodcet Nife, gimme a tell. Tyunes Stratevarius Bard of 54 missed notes ... me ... and keeps ... *grins* thanks to everyone
ygData.messageBody:
What server are you playing on? If Rodcet Nife, gimme a tell.
Tyunes Stratevarius
Bard of 54 missed notes
compugeeke <compugeeke@...> wrote: --- In eqbards@y..., Talies the Wanderer <snicker@p...> wrote:
> At 06:56 PM 12/21/2001 +0000, you wrote:
>
> >Sorry if I'm asking silly questions, but that's what newbies like
me
> >are for aint it? :)
>
>
> Please - keep asking, Fohat - it reminds us where we all started
and keeps
> us humble. ;)
>
> Talies the Wanderer

*grins* thanks to everyone who've replied. I also read that I could
make my own armor using a loom but apparently I would need a Cat
pelt or somesuch for medium and I have yet to see a cat in Greater
Faydark. Still, I can't wait to go see if I can buy some, i have 2
or 3 pp burning a hole in my pocket :)

-fohat, on his way to lvl 5!
